title: How to post on another region's boards with my NA account?
body:
Just being logged into my NA account does not allow me to vote, comment, or upvote anything.

How do I do that with my NA account?

replies.body: You can only participate in allowed regions, and in this case NA cannot post in EUW or EUNE if I recall correctly.  You'll need an account for that region to participate!  Unfortunately, there isn't anything I can do about that but if you have any concerns or feedback on this share it on the [Boards Feedback](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback) section.

Well I suppose that explains it

I'll admit it's odd that EUNE can post here but we can't post there, but there isn't anything you can do about it.

Thanks <3
